Doc: Describes a european trigger applied to an FX digtal option.

Source.Contents:
/#
   Describes a european trigger applied to an FX digtal option.
 #/
record FpML5.transparency.FxAccrualTrigger {
  # Defines the two currencies for an FX trade and the quotation relationship between the two currencies.
  quotedCurrencyPair : FpML5.transparency.QuotedCurrencyPair?

  # The market rate is observed relative to the trigger rate, and if it is found to be on the predefined side of (above or below) the trigger rate, a barrier event is deemed to have occurred.
  triggerRate : decimal?

  id : string?

}

quotedCurrencyPair.Doc: Defines the two currencies for an FX trade and the quotation relationship between the two currencies.
quotedCurrencyPair.Name: quotedCurrencyPair

triggerRate.Doc: The market rate is observed relative to the trigger rate, and if it is found to be on the predefined side of (above or below) the trigger rate, a barrier event is deemed to have occurred.
triggerRate.Name: triggerRate
